result.reason: This is a clear user-facing enhancement request for automatic inheritance propagation that maintainers have already indicated interest in adding.
result.approach: Add an `Auto` option to the Inherit All UI and wire it to existing inheritance comparison logic so changed parent properties propagate automatically to children.
